Name: CABIN ATMOSPHERE
checklistText:
<size=21>Cabin Atmosphere Verification</size>

Panel 2:
	1 CAB PRESS ind 				- 5.6-6.2 psia & decr
Panel 7:
	2 DIRECT O2 vlv 				- close (cw)
Panel 2:
	3 O2 FLOW ind 					- 0.2 lb/hr
Panel 351:
	4 EMER CAB PRESS sel 			- BOTH
Panel 380:
	5 SUIT RETURN vlv 				- open (pull)
	6 Gloves & helmet removed
Panel 2:
	7 When CAB PRESS ind < 5.3 psia
		O2 FLOW ind 				- 1.0 lb/hr
		O2 FLOW HI lt 				- on
Panel 1, 3, 122:
	MASTER ALARM pb/lt 			- on, push

			CAUTION
	Opening cb ECS PRESS XDUCER 2 MNB to extinguish O2 FLOW HI lt is 
	a crew option. If exercised, the following redundant functions will 
	be lost.

			CO2 PP ind & C/W circuit
			CAB PRESS ind
			O2 reg out press (PCM only)
			GLY EVAP STM PRESS ind
			O2 FLOW ind

Panel 5:
	8 cb ECS PRESS XDUCER 2 MNB 	- open

	9 60/40 cab purge complete at 8 hrs after LM isolation following 
		transposition & docking. For 24 hrs after LM isolation following 
		T & D, LM press will be monitored at ≈8-hr intervals using tunl 
		vent vlv in the LM/CM ΔP position. At 24 hrs after LM isolation, 
		it will be determined if a Δ cabin purge is req & the length of 
		this purge.
Panel 252:
			WASTE STOW vlv 		- CLOSE
Panel 5:
			cb ECS PRESS XDUCER 2 MNB - close
Panel 2:
			O2 FLOW HI lt 			- out

Steps.Text: When CAB PRESS ind <5.3 psia, proceed.
